tool_description: Resolve Hong Kong Terminologies (e.g. location: 尖咀 => 尖沙咀)
name: Hong Kong Terminology Resolution
title: Hong Kong Terminology Resolution

api_list.name: Location
api_list.description: Resolve a place name in Hong Kong
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://hkterms.p.rapidapi.com/location/尖咀"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "hkterms.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://hkterms.p.rapidapi.com/location/{q}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "hkterms.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
